extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Confluence Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Confluence Data Center or Confluence Server version is affected by CVE-2024-21678 by verifying the installed version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the Confluence version affected by CVE-2024-21678?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Install the latest version of Atlassian products to mitigate the vulnerability.
